title: Configuration System XML Documentation Complete
details:

3. **EnvironmentWrapper.cs** - Already had proper XML docs with class-level and `/// <inheritdoc />` comments

✅ All new configuration system files have proper XML documentation

The configuration system now has complete and comprehensive documentation for both implementation and test coverage.
